entry.title: The Shadows and Monsters
entry.summary:
Author: winnow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,104Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 83

Summary: “How,” he starts and then swallows against his raw throat. “How did I do that? How am I able to do this now? After all this time.” Deaton says nothing. He stares at the boy from the wall.“Tell me!” Stiles cries, tears spilling down his cheeks.“Oh Stiles,” he whispers, “You always could.” Deaton looks out the window again, the distortion making the world a nightmarish caricature. “And now, they know it too.”

entry.title: Sugar in His Fangs
entry.summary:
Author: meimome

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,694Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 219

Summary: "Everyone has that one ex.Stiles Stilinski just happens to be the one your ancestors warned you about."Five hundred years ago, Klaus Mikaelson made a mistake.Not the kind you forget.Not the kind you forgive.He dumped Stiles Stilinski.The supernatural world learned one thing the hard wayDon’t date Stiles Stilinski.Or if you do, don’t lie. Don’t cheat. Definitely don’t try to rip his heart out.Klaus Mikaelson broke all three rules.Now he runs.And everyone else? They know better than to ask.Stiles isn’t just some ex with a grudge.He’s the original chaos—spark magic fueled by belief, bloodlust sharpened by betrayal, and a memory that doesn’t forget.He didn’t spend centuries chasing Klaus because revenge was his whole life.But when the man you trusted rips out your heart and expects you to still stay, well… let’s just say grudges aren’t the half of it.Now, after years of silence, Stiles rolls into Mystic Falls with nothing but a crooked smile, a carefully honed plan, and a warning:He’s here to stir up more than old ghosts.Maybe it’s Klaus he’s after.Maybe it’s something—or someone—more complicated.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,581Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 89

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,694Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 218

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

Author: brsfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,662Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 55

Summary: Stiles just wanted one thing: a quiet night, some alone time, and DomTop69 to take care of his chronic case of blue balls. What he got instead was murder, missing organs, and Derek Hale crashing through his hookup like an overprotective sourwolf-shaped wrecking ball. Now there are dead bodies piling up in Beacon Hills, Stiles’ crush is way too obvious to every werewolf in a five-mile radius, and apparently? Derek may have considered snapping his hot Grindr date's neck with his werewolf claws. It’s messy, it’s dangerous, it’s infuriating, and Stiles can’t stop himself from diving headfirst into the chaos. Typical. A casefic full of supernatural mystery, sarcastic banter, Grindr disasters, Derek’s terrible timing, Stiles Stilinski’s very inconvenient feelings, and blue balls so blue Stiles might star as the Blues Clues' new host.

entry.title: Crush
entry.summary:
Author: formeldehyde

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 125,563Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 599

Summary: Stiles is ready to start his senior year and hoping to leave the trauma of the past behind him, finding new strength and comfort in his pack. What he doesn't expect is a familiar face behind the desk of his last period class. Mr.Hale proves to be just as much of a pain in Stiles' ass as he is the best teacher Stiles has ever had.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,589Chapters: 50/75Kudos: 44

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,103Chapters: 11/18Kudos: 11

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: Holiday Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ieatassforbreakfast009

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,175Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: All Stiles wanted was to give the Hale Pack a normal holiday season—tree decorating, sugar cookies, and zero supernatural explosions. Unfortunately, the wolves are competitive about everything, Derek is allergic to fun, and Stiles’ spark might actually explode from holiday stress. Still, if it means giving the pack a family again, Stiles is willing to drag them through holiday hell… one disaster at a time.
